name: ECHOES OF WAR: The Last Heartbeat
description: ECHOES OF WAR is an action packed shooter with strategic elements for virtual reality devices. Set up your defences, lay waste to hundreds of drones and mechs and use all you can salvage to repair your ship.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 8.1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA  GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
